action.script:
from slackclient import SlackClient
from swimlane import Swimlane
from swimlane.core.search import EQ, NOT_EQ, CONTAINS, EXCLUDES, GT, GTE, LT, LTE
from requests import Session
from zeep import Client, helpers
from zeep.transports import Transport
from zeep.wsse.username import UsernameToken
import collections
import re
import os
import urllib3
import time
import smtplib
import json
from email.MIMEMultipart import MIMEMultipart
from email.MIMEText import MIMEText
import ubersmith_client

urllib3.disable_warnings(urllib3.exceptions.InsecureRequestWarning)


slApiUser = sw_context.inputs['slApiUser']
slApiKey = sw_context.inputs['slApiKey']
slApiHost = sw_context.inputs['slApiHost']
seAppId = sw_context.config['ApplicationId']
seRecordId = sw_context.config['RecordId']
swimlane = Swimlane(slApiHost, slApiUser, slApiKey, verify_ssl=False)
lrApiUser = sw_context.inputs['lrApiUser']
lrApiKey = sw_context.inputs['lrApiKey']
lrApiHost = sw_context.inputs['lrApiHost']
ubsApiUser = sw_context.inputs['ubsApiUser']
ubsApiKey = sw_context.inputs['ubsApiKey']
ubsApiHost = sw_context.inputs['ubsApiHost']
ubsApi = ubersmith_client.api.init(ubsApiHost, ubsApiKey, ubsApiKey)

os.environ['HTTPS_PROXY'] = sw_context.inputs['proxyUrl']
sc = SlackClient(sw_context.inputs['slackToken'])


def notifyClientofSecurityAlert(seRecord):
    subject = "{} Security Event Detected - {} - {}".format(seRecord['QV: Priority'], seRecord['CS: Alarm Rule Name'], seRecord['QV: Case Number'])
    for r in seRecord['Primary Alert Contact Information']:
        body = r['Name'] + ",\r\n"
    body += "\r\n"
    body += "PhoenixNAP has detected a potential security event in your environment.\r\n\r\n"
    body += "Risk Rating:\t\t{}\r\n".format(seRecord['QV: Priority']) + "\r\n"
    if seRecord['VERIS: Confidence?'] is not None:
        body += "Confidence Rating:\t{}\r\n".format(seRecord['VERIS: Confidence?']) + "\r\n"
    body += "Rule Name:\t\t\t{}\r\n".format(seRecord['CS: Alarm Rule Name']) + "\r\n"
    body += "Attack Lifecycle: \t{}\r\n".format(seRecord['INV: Attack Chain Phase']) + "\r\n"
    body += "Rule Description: \t{}\r\n".format(seRecord['Rule Logic']) + "\r\n"
    body += "Rule Summary:\r\n\t{}\r\n".format(seRecord['Rule Introduction']) + "\r\n"
    if seRecord['INV: Recommended Action by Client'] is not None:
        body += "Recommended Remediation Action:\r\n\t{}\r\n".format(seRecord['INV: Recommended Action by Client']) + "\r\n"
    body += "Evidence of Attack:\r\n"
    body += "\t" + seRecord['Log Message (Copy and Paste from Log Rhythm)'] + "\r\n"
    body += "\r\n"
    body += "Should you have any questions regarding this alert please reach out to the PhoenixNAP SOC.   This event will assumed to be resolved if no response is received in 3 days.\r\n\r\n"
    body += "Regards,\r\nPhoenixNAP Security Team"
    return subject, body


def convert(name):
    """Formats keys

        Args:
            name: string
    """
    s1 = re.sub('(.)([A-Z][a-z]+)', r'\1 \2', name)
    return re.sub('([a-z0-9])([A-Z])', r'\1 \2', s1)


def prefix(key):
    """add correct prfix to fields based on key

        Args:
            key: string
    """
    if key == 'Impacted Location':
        return 'IL: '
    elif key == 'Impacted Network':
        return 'IN: '
    elif key == 'Origin Location':
        return 'OL: '
    elif key == 'Origin Network':
        return 'ON: '


def setLrApiClient(url, username, password):
    """Creates and set LogRythem API Client

    Args:
        url: string LogRythem API server url
        username: string LogRythem API username
        password: string LogRythem API password

    Return:
        apiClient: object
    """
    session = Session()
    session.verify = False
    transport = Transport(session=session, timeout=120)
    apiClient = Client(url, wsse=UsernameToken(username, password), transport=transport, strict=False)
    return apiClient


def getEventForAlarm(apiClient, swimlane, lredAppId, alarmValue):
    """Gets the evant date from Log Rythem based on alarmId

   Args:
       apiClient: object from setLrApiClient function
       swimlane: object, swimlane class object
       lredAppId: string swimlane LRED app id
       alarmValue: staring alramId

   Return:
       setLrApiClient: object, swimlane new record object
   """
    response = apiClient.service.GetAlarmEventsByID(alarmValue['Alarm ID'], True)
    eventList = []
    for event in response['Events']['LogDataModel']:
        eventDict = {}
        input_dict = helpers.serialize_object(event)
        for key, value in input_dict.iteritems():
            if isinstance(value, collections.OrderedDict):
                for key2, value2 in value.iteritems():
                    eventDict[prefix(convert(key)) + convert(key2)] = value2
            else:
                if str(value) == 'nan':
                    eventDict[convert(key)] = None
                else:
                    eventDict[convert(key)] = value
            eventDict['Alarm ID'] = alarmValue['Alarm ID']
            eventDict['Alarm Rule ID'] = alarmValue['Alarm Rule ID']
            eventDict['Alarm Rule Name'] = alarmValue['Alarm Rule Name']
            eventDict['SE: Tracking ID'] = alarmValue['AV: Tracking ID']
            eventDict['SE: Application ID'] = alarmValue['AV: Application ID']
            eventDict['SE: Record ID'] = alarmValue['AV:  Record ID']
            eventDict['SE: Security Events Ref'] = alarmValue
            eventDict['ts'] = alarmValue['ts']
            eventDict['channel'] = alarmValue['channel']
        lredApp = swimlane.apps.get(id=lredAppId)
        newLredAppRecord = lredApp.records.create(**eventDict)
        eventList.append(collections.OrderedDict(sorted(eventDict.items(), key=lambda x: x[0])))
        return newLredAppRecord


def addLrComment(apiClient, alarmId, comment):
    """ Adds comment to LogRythem

        Args:
            apiClient: object from setLrApiClient function
            alarmId: string
            comment: string
    """
    lrComment = apiClient.service.AddAlarmComments(alarmId, comment)


def mail():
    subject, body = notifyClientofSecurityAlert(seRecord)
    msg = MIMEMultipart()
    msg['From'] = 'swimlane@PHX0-PSSPSL01.pss.phoenixnap-internal.com'
    msg['To'] = 'jeremyc@phoenixnap.com'
    msg['Subject'] = subject
    msg.add_header('reply-to', 'soc@phoenixnap.com')
    msg.attach(MIMEText(body, 'plain'))

    server = smtplib.SMTP('mail-01.dsc.phoenixnap-internal.com', 25)
    text = msg.as_string()
    server.sendmail('swimlane@PHX0-PSSPSL01.pss.phoenixnap-internal.com', 'jeremyc@phoenixnap.com', text)
    print server.set_debuglevel(9)
    server.quit()


def swimlaneUbersmithPriorityMapping(priority):
    if priority == 'P1 - Critical':
        return 3
    elif priority == 'P2 - High':
        return 2
    elif priority == 'P3 - Medium':
        return 1
    elif priority == 'P4 - Low':
        return 0
    elif priority == 3:
        return 'P1 - Critical'
    elif priority == 2:
        return 'P2 - High'
    elif priority == 1:
        return 'P3 - Medium'
    elif priority == 0:
        return 'P4 - Low'
    elif priority == '911':
        return 'P1 - Critical'
    elif priority == 'High':
        return 'P2 - High'
    elif priority == 'Normal':
        return 'P3 - Medium'
    elif priority == 'Low':
        return'P4 - Low'
    else:
        return 'Wrong Priority'

def swimlaneEmailFieldToUbsEmailField(swimlaneField):
    if swimlaneField is not None:
        toList = []
        for t in swimlaneField:
            toList.append(t)
        if len(toList) > 1:
            to = ", ".join(toList)
        else:
            to = toList[0]
    else:
        to = None
    return to

def swimlaneUserToUbsUser(swimlaneUser):
    userApp = swimlane.apps.get(id='aU_GzJojmJLhrZ_8D')
    userReport = userApp.reports.build('Get All User Records')
    userReport.filter('Swimlane ID', EQ, swimlaneUser[0].id)
    if len(userReport) == 1:
        for userRecord in userReport:
            return userRecord['UBS ID']

try:
    seApp = swimlane.apps.get(id=seAppId)
    seRecord = seApp.records.get(id=seRecordId)
    if len(seRecord['LR: Event(s)']) < 1:
        if len(seRecord['LR: Event(s)']) < seRecord['Event Count']:
            apiClient = setLrApiClient(ubsApiHost, ubsApiUser, ubsApiKey)
            newLredAppRecord = getEventForAlarm(apiClient, swimlane, lredAppId, seRecord)
            comment = "Pulled Events for LR Alarm {} into swimlane.".format(seRecord['Alarm ID'])
            addLrComment(apiClient, seRecord['Alarm ID'], comment)
            seRecord['LG: LRED Pulled'] = 'yes'
            seRecord['LR: Event(s)'].add(newLredAppRecord)
            seRecord.save()
        time.sleep(5)
        seRecord = seApp.records.get(id=seRecordId)
    subject, body = notifyClientofSecurityAlert(seRecord)
    params = {'internal_ticket': 1, 'body': body, 'subject': subject, 'user_id': swimlaneUserToUbsUser(seRecord['AP: Assigned To User(s)']),
              'recipient': 'jeremyc@phoenixnap.com',
              #'recipient': swimlaneEmailFieldToUbsEmailField(seRecord['To']),
              'author': 'soc@phoenixnap.com',
              #'cc': swimlaneEmailFieldToUbsEmailField(seRecord['CC']), 'bcc': swimlaneEmailFieldToUbsEmailField(seRecord['BCC']),
              'priority': swimlaneUbersmithPriorityMapping(seRecord['CS: Priority']), 'queue': 139, 'client_id': seRecord['UBS: Client ID'],
              'meta_security_event_source': seRecord['QV: Case Source'],
              'meta_security_case_stage': seRecord['QV Case Stage'],
              'meta_swimlane_case_number': seRecord['QV: Case Number'],
              'meta_security_case_type': 'Security Event',
              'meta_date_security_event_occurred': seRecord['TL: Event Occurred'], }
    ubsTicketNumber = ubsApi.support.ticket_submit_outgoing(**params)
    sw_outputs = [{"ubsTicketNumber": ubsTicketNumber}]
except Exception as e:
    scText = 'Error running integration SE: UBS Notification.  Error: {}'.format(e)
    scApiCall = sc.api_call("chat.postMessage", channel="GCWRQ3802", text=scText)
    scData = {'ts': scApiCall['ts'], 'channel': scApiCall['channel']}
